channel.title: {COME ON!} Try and work this out then lmao! to do with emotes!
channel.description:
right when you set some thing to do an emote it's all good, but when you try to set it to do 2. er then its not -.-
im trying to get the spining plate to work have all other pets and toys :D made em my self (didnt make yoyo) but i cant get the spining plate right
emote spins the plate emote puts the plate away
because im using 2 emotes it skips the first one and dose the second one
is there any way of it not! skiping the first emote, like play for so menny seconds then go to the second emote
If you didnt get that i want to show 2 emotes playing the first one for so long then going to the second one after the first!
NOTE i dont want it to loop over and over!!!
